ValidationRule.description: The CQ Due Date cannot be less than Today.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CQ_Due_Date__c < TODAY(),CONTAINS( Quote_Type__c , 'CQ'), NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin),$Profile.Name <> 'Data Loader Profile',$Profile.Name <> 'Integration API Only Profile', OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(CQ_Due_Date__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "CQ Due Date" cannot be in the Past
